title: Tokimeki Tonight
resume: Tokimeki Tonight is a manga series by Koi Ikeno, which ran in the Japanese manga magazine, Ribon, from July 1982 to October 1994. An anime TV series was adapted from the manga and was broadcast on NTV from October 7, 1982 to September 22, 1983.
